step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Remember to keep your body muscles gently tightened throughout the inhale.
You're placing your hands well. Focus on the full body muscle tightening during the inhale, as this helps pump the lymph fluid.
Excellent! You're inhaling through your nose and tightening your muscles. Keep visualizing the fluid moving towards your chest.
Great job relaxing your muscles as you exhale through your mouth. Continue visualizing pushing fluid out.
Second rep, great start! Remember to engage your whole body muscles as you inhale through your nose.
Hands are well-placed. Ensure the entire body is tight during the inhale to maximize lymphatic stimulation.
You're doing well with the nasal inhale and muscle tightening. Keep up the visualization of fluid movement.
Perfect exhale and muscle relaxation. You're effectively completing the deep breathing exercise to aid lymphatic flow.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the deep breathing exercise! Remember to inhale through your nose while tightening your whole body muscles, and exhale through your mouth while relaxing. This helps stimulate lymphatic flow and promotes healing.
